clusters.title: Devastation on repeat: How climate change is worsening Pakistan's deadly floods
clusters.neutral_headline: Devastation on repeat: How climate change is worsening Pakistan's deadly floods

items.title: Devastation on repeat: How climate change is worsening Pakistan's deadly floods
items.standfirst: The BBC speaks to those who have lost everything in this year's monsoon season and finds out why it will likely happen again.
items.content: The BBC speaks to those who have lost everything in this year's monsoon season and finds out why it will likely happen again.

clusters.title: Thousands of poorest Scots to receive free weight-loss jabs in trial

items.title: Thousands of poorest Scots to receive free weight-loss jabs in trial
items.standfirst: Up to 5,000 people in Scotland will take the injections as part of a multi-million pound study being led by Glasgow University.
items.content: Up to 5,000 people in Scotland will take the injections as part of a multi-million pound study being led by Glasgow University.

clusters.title: Medics got me through cancer but they can't help with my menopause

items.title: Medics got me through cancer but they can't help with my menopause
items.standfirst: When Kat Denisi was diagnosed with breast cancer at 32 she was put into a medically induced menopause.
items.content: When Kat Denisi was diagnosed with breast cancer at 32 she was put into a medically induced menopause.
